title: Remix
description: Full stack web framework that lets you focus on the user interface and work back through web standards to deliver a fast, slick, and resilient user experience.

title: Astro
description: The web framework for content-driven websites. Astro powers the world's fastest websites, client-side web apps, dynamic API endpoints, and everything in-between.

title: Solid.js
description: Simple and performant reactivity for building user interfaces. Solid is a declarative JavaScript library for creating user interfaces with fine-grained reactivity.

title: Deno
description: A modern runtime for JavaScript and TypeScript. Deno is secure by default, supports TypeScript out of the box, and has built-in development tools.

title: Bun
description: Incredibly fast JavaScript runtime, bundler, test runner, and package manager – all in one. Bun is designed as a drop-in replacement for Node.js.

title: tRPC
description: End-to-end typesafe APIs made easy. Experience the full power of TypeScript inference to boost productivity for your full-stack application.

title: Drizzle ORM
description: TypeScript ORM that is production ready. Drizzle is a lightweight and performant TypeScript ORM with developer experience in mind.

title: Turbo
description: Incremental bundler and build system optimized for JavaScript and TypeScript, written in Rust. Turbo makes your team faster.

title: Nx
description: Smart, fast and extensible build system. Nx is a build system with built-in tooling and advanced CI capabilities for monorepos.

title: Cypress
description: Fast, easy and reliable testing for anything that runs in a browser. Cypress makes it easy to write, debug and run end-to-end tests.

title: Testing Library
description: Simple and complete testing utilities that encourage good testing practices. Testing Library helps you write maintainable tests.

title: Zod
description: TypeScript-first schema validation with static type inference. Zod is designed to be as developer-friendly as possible with zero dependencies.

title: Pnpm
description: Fast, disk space efficient package manager. Pnpm uses a content-addressable filesystem to store packages and creates hard links.

title: Turborepo
description: High-performance build system for JavaScript and TypeScript codebases. Turborepo leverages caching to turbocharge your local and CI builds.

title: SWR
description: React Hooks for Data Fetching. SWR is a strategy to first return the data from cache, then send the fetch request, and finally come with up-to-date data.

title: TanStack Query
description: Powerful asynchronous state management for TS/JS, React, Solid, Vue and Svelte. Fetch, cache and update data without touching any global state.

title: Shadcn UI
description: Beautifully designed components that you can copy and paste into your apps. Accessible, customizable, and open source.

title: Radix UI
description: Unstyled, accessible components for building high‑quality design systems and web apps in React. Radix provides low-level UI primitives.

title: Headless UI
description: Completely unstyled, fully accessible UI components, designed to integrate beautifully with Tailwind CSS. Built by the Tailwind team.

title: Railway
description: Infrastructure, Instantly. Railway is a deployment platform where you can provision infrastructure, develop with that infrastructure locally, and deploy to the cloud.
